title: Remove authentication guards blocking Admin Center access

requirements.text: Remove Internet Identity authentication checks from AdminCenterPage.tsx that are blocking access to the Admin Center interface

quotes: I would like you to remove the security from the admin center so I can access it

acceptanceCriteria: User can access Admin Center interface immediately without being blocked
No 'Connecting to backend...' loading state caused by authentication checks

requirements.text: Remove authentication/authorization guards from backend Motoko functions that service the Admin Center (admin dashboard data, analytics, transactions, role management)

quotes: The security is using Internet Identity authentication
The blocking is happening in both frontend and backend

acceptanceCriteria: Backend functions for admin operations do not perform principal verification
Backend functions for admin data retrieval do not check caller authorization
Admin Center can successfully fetch data from backend without authentication errors

requirements.text: Preserve all existing Admin Center functionality including role settings, deposits, financial data, transaction history, and user management features

quotes: I don't want you to rebuild the whole admin center from scratch because that will erase my deposits and my connections
everything is there I just can't get to it

acceptanceCriteria: All existing deposit records remain intact
User can assign themselves as owner/admin once access is restored

constraints: Do not rebuild or replace the Admin Center component - only remove authentication guards
Do not modify or delete any existing financial data, deposits, or transaction records
Preserve all existing role management and settings functionality
nonGoals: Adding new Admin Center features or functionality
Changing the Admin Center UI or layout
